mapper.insert: insert into BaoshenWeatherLive (weatherLiveId, weatherStationCode, times, Year, Mon, Day, Hour, Min, PRE, WIN_D_Avg_10mi, WIN_S_Avg_10mi, WIN_S_Max, GST, GST_Max, GST_Min) values(#{weatherLiveId}, #{weatherStationCode}, #{times}, #{Year}, #{Mon}, #{Day}, #{Hour}, #{Min}, #{PRE}, #{WIN_D_Avg_10mi}, #{WIN_S_Avg_10mi}, #{WIN_S_Max}, #{GST}, #{GST_Max}, #{GST_Min})

insert into BaoshenWeather (weatherId, nationalWeatherStationCode, times, Year, Mon, Day, Hour, WEP_Now) values(#{weatherId}, #{nationalWeatherStationCode}, #{times}, #{Year}, #{Mon}, #{Day}, #{Hour}, #{WEP_Now})
